name: Elly
content: Well, I wasn't always a flower.

name: Elly
content: I used to be a person, like you. With hands. Hands capable of swinging a fishing rod.

name: Elly
content: Heck, I used to spend hours every day catching fish...

name: Elly
content: I'd always throw them back, though. Never wanted to eat them. Just had fun catching them.

name: Elly
content: Until one day, the Fish King complained to the local witch, who turned me into this.

name: Elly
content: And you know, I don't mind it. Being a flower's got its merits too. It's just...

name: Elly
content: And you've been here listening to me for long enough now...

name: Elly
content: Would you be so kind as to deliver my vengeance for me? I'll even give you my precious fishing rod.
